item.title: [Paper Reading] Conveyor: Continuous Deployment at Meta
item.description: Meta has released a paper titled Conveyor: One-Tool-Fits-All Continuous Software Deployment at Meta, which offers an in-depth look at the company’s state-of-the-art continuous deployment system, Conveyor. This system is integral to Meta’s operations, deploying containers over an immense scale across millions of machines. From the paper, three key insights emerge: Meta emphasizes the practice of continuous deployment without manual intervention. The ingrained philosophy within the organization is to “release early, release often,” with the aim of rapidly implementing bug fixes or security updates.
